knimeNode.name: Tile Loop Start
knimeNode.shortDescription: Loops over tiles of equal size.

fullDescription.intro:
Tile Loop, creates tiles of equal size of an input image. Only the chosen input images are processed. Other columns will removed from the table. The loop is executed once per input image.
The image is expanded so it can be split into tiles of equal size.
fullDescription.option: The column which contains the images which should be processed.
The tile size. Deselect the checkbox to use only one tile with the image size in this dimension.
The overlap per dimension. Deselect the checkbox to use zero overlap in this dimension.
The out of bounds strategy which is used if the tiles doesn't fit perfectly and for the overlap of the border tiles.

ports.inPort: Any datatable containing images in one column.
ports.outPort: Tiles of the current image. The table has one column which is named as the chosen column of the input table and one row per tile.
